title: How to Connect Your Accounts on Pinterest

steps.title: Open the Pinterest app and log in.
steps.content: Open the Pinterest app and log in. First, you must make sure that you have the Pinterest application downloaded to your mobile device. You can get this from the Google Play Store if you are using Android, or the App Store if you are on iOS. If you're not automatically logged in, do that now.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It's in the bottom-right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap ••• (Android) or the smooth gear icon (iOS).
steps.content: Tap ••• (Android) or the smooth gear icon (iOS). The three-dot menu or the smooth gear icons are in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings (Android).
steps.content: Tap Settings (Android). It's usually the first option on the menu. If you're using an iPhone or iPad, you can skip this step.

steps.title: Tap Add account.
steps.content: Tap Add account . You'll see this listed under the "Actions" header.

steps.title: Tap Connect existing account.
steps.content: Tap Connect existing account . If you want to make a new account, tap Create a new personal account instead. Tap Create to make a business account if you don't have one already.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to log into your other Pinterest account.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to log into your other Pinterest account. You'll either need to enter your email and password or you can use "Continue with Google" or "Continue with Facebook." Enter your password when prompted. To switch accounts, tap the ••• icon (Android) or the smooth gear icon (iOS) and Switch accounts . [1] X Research source To remove the linked account, log out of it.

steps.title: Go to https://pinterest.com and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://pinterest.com and log in. If you don’t have an account, you will have to make a new one; it only takes a few minutes. You can do this from any desktop web browser.

steps.title: Click next to your profile picture.
steps.content: Click next to your profile picture. You'll see the downwards-facing arrow in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Click Add account.
steps.content: Click Add account . It's usually the first option in the menu.

steps.title: Click Connect account under "Connect existing account.
steps.content: Click Connect account under "Connect existing account. " If you don't have another Pinterest account, click Create to create a new personal account. You can also make a business account if you don't have one already.

steps.title: Follow the on-screen instructions to log into your other Pinterest account.
steps.content: Follow the on-screen instructions to log into your other Pinterest account. You'll either need to enter your email and password or you can use "Continue with Google" or "Continue with Facebook." Enter your password when prompted. To switch accounts, click the downwards-facing arrow icon and Switch accounts . [2] X Research source To remove the linked account, log out of it.

steps.title: Open the Pinterest app and log in.
steps.content: Open the Pinterest app and log in. First, you must make sure that you have the Pinterest application downloaded to your mobile device. You can get this from the Google Play Store if you are using Android, or the App Store if you are on iOS. If you're not automatically logged in, do that now.

steps.title: Tap your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap your profile picture. It's in the bottom-right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap ••• (Android) or the smooth gear icon (iOS).
steps.content: Tap ••• (Android) or the smooth gear icon (iOS). The three-dot menu or the smooth gear icons are in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Tap Settings (Android).
steps.content: Tap Settings (Android). It's usually the first option on the menu. If you're using an iPhone or iPad, you can skip this step.

steps.title: Tap Account settings.
steps.content: Tap Account settings . You'll see this listed under the "Personal information" header.

steps.title: Tap Login options.
steps.content: Tap Login options . This menu option is in the middle of the menu.

steps.title: Tap the switch next to a social media platform that you want to use to sign in.
steps.content: Tap the switch next to a social media platform that you want to use to sign in. When the switch is to the right, it's enabled and you can use that platform login information to log in to Pinterest. You may be prompted to enter the appropriate login information for the secondary social media account you're selecting as a login. You'll also be asked to allow the social platform to connect to Pinterest. Your changes are saved when you switch the toggles, so you can navigate away from this page without tapping a Save button. steps.title: Go to https://pinterest.com and log in.
steps.content: Go to https://pinterest.com and log in. If you don’t have an account, you will have to make a new one; it only takes a few minutes. You can do this from any desktop web browser.

steps.title: Click next to your profile picture.
steps.content: Click next to your profile picture. You'll see the downwards-facing arrow in the top right corner of your screen.

steps.title: Click Settings.
steps.content: Click Settings . You'll see this under the "More options" header.

steps.title: Click Account Settings.
steps.content: Click Account Settings . It's in the menu on the left side of the page.

steps.title: Click the boxes next to the social media platforms that you want to use to sign in.
steps.content: Click the boxes next to the social media platforms that you want to use to sign in. You'll see the social media options under the "Login options" header. You may be prompted to enter the appropriate login information for the secondary social media account you're selecting as a login. You'll also be asked to allow the social platform to connect to Pinterest. Any changes will be saved automatically, so you can navigate away from this page without clicking a Save button.
